data.message: We're probably all friends with ppl who are on drugs too but that doesn't mean that we should legalize drugs. Horrible liberal logic.

replies.message: Shame on you for your ignorance. two people living there life isnt a good comparison to legalizing drugs. obviously people shouldnt be doing drugs because it wrecks families and destroys lives. I have never heard of a family being destroyed because sally and jessica next door got married and health insurance for eachother. get real.
I just didnt like this comment is all.
Choosing to do drugs is not an inherent part of who a human is. Retarded conservative logic.
Being gay isn't an inherent part of who a human is. It's a choice that they make later in life. I never "chose to be straight" bc that's how we're all born.
